question:
Fill in the Blank:

Please ________ the teacher carefully.
solution:
listen to

‘Listen to’ means to pay attention to sound or speech.

Hindi Meaning: ध्वनि पर ध्यान देना

Complete Sentence:

Please listen to the teacher carefully.

कृपया शिक्षक को ध्यान से सुनिए।

Extra Example:

She listens to music daily.

वह रोज़ संगीत सुनती है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She continues to ________ peace and happiness.
solution:
long for

‘Long for’ means to desire deeply.

Hindi Meaning: बहुत इच्छा करना

Complete Sentence:

She continues to long for peace and happiness.

वह शांति और सुख की प्रबल इच्छा रखती है।

Extra Example:

She longed for her hometown.

वह अपने शहर की बहुत याद कर रही थी।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Many elderly people ________ see their hometown once again.
solution:
long to

'Long to' is used to express a deep desire to do something.

Hindi Meaning: कुछ करने की गहरी इच्छा होना

Complete Sentence:

Many elderly people long to see their hometown once again.

कई बुजुर्ग एक बार फिर अपने गृहनगर को देखने की लालसा रखते हैं।

Extra Example:

He longs to return to his hometown.

वह अपने गृहनगर लौटने की लालसा

question:
Fill in the Blank:

It’s your duty to ________ your younger siblings.
solution:
look after

‘Look after’ means to take care of.

Hindi Meaning: देखभाल करना

Complete Sentence:

It’s your duty to look after your younger siblings.

अपने छोटे भाई-बहनों की देखभाल करना आपकी जिम्मेदारी है।

Extra Example:

She looks after her younger brother.

वह अपने छोटे भाई की देखभाल करती है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I am ________ my lost phone.
solution:
look for

‘Look for’ means to search for something.

Hindi Meaning: खोजने के लिए

Complete Sentence:

I am looking for my lost phone.

मैं अपना खोया हुआ फोन ढूंढ रहा हूँ।

Extra Example:

He is looking for his keys.

वह अपनी चाबियाँ ढूँढ रहा है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The committee will ________ the matter.
solution:
look into

‘Look into’ means to investigate or examine.

Hindi Meaning: जांच करना

Complete Sentence:

The committee will look into the matter.

समिति इस मामले की जाँच करेगी।

Extra Example:

Police will look into the matter.

पुलिस इस मामले की जांच करेगी।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Let’s ________ the document before submitting.
solution:
look over

‘Look over’ means to quickly examine or review.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ की जांच करना

Complete Sentence:

Let’s look over the document before submitting.

दस्तावेज़ जमा करने से पहले एक बार जांच लेते हैं।

Extra Example:

He looked over the documents.

उसने दस्तावेजों की जांच की।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He has great ________ animals.
solution:
love for

'Love for' expresses strong affection.

Hindi Meaning: के प्रति स्नेह

Complete Sentence:

He has great love for animals.

उसे जानवरों से गहरा प्यार है।

Extra Example:

She has love for animals.

उसे जानवरों से प्यार है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is always ________ her team.
solution:
loyal to

'Loyal to' means showing constant support.

Hindi Meaning: वफादार

Complete Sentence:

She is always loyal to her team.

वह अपनी टीम के प्रति हमेशा वफादार रहती है।

Extra Example:

He is loyal to his team.

वह अपनी टीम के प्रति वफादार है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He remained ________ his party till the end.
solution:
loyal towards

'Loyal towards' expresses long-term support.

Hindi Meaning: वफादार या समर्पित

Complete Sentence:

He remained loyal towards his party.

वह अंत तक अपनी पार्टी के प्रति वफादार रहा।

Extra Example:

The dog was loyal towards its owner.

कुत्ता अपने मालिक के प्रति वफादार था।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He showed great ________ the company.
solution:
loyalty to

'Loyalty to' means dedication.

Hindi Meaning: समर्थन की प्रबल भावना

Complete Sentence:

He showed great loyalty to the company.

उसने कंपनी के प्रति गहरी निष्ठा दिखाई।

Extra Example:

She has loyalty to her country.

वह अपने देश के प्रति वफादार है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ be part of the show.
solution:
lucky to

'Lucky to' is used to express fortune in doing something.

Hindi Meaning: भाग्यशाली

Complete Sentence:

He is lucky to be part of the show.

वह शो का हिस्सा बनकर भाग्यशाली है।

Extra Example:

I am lucky to have such friends.

मैं इतने अच्छे दोस्तों वाला भाग्यशाली हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is ________ fashion.
solution:
mad about

'Mad about' means very passionate.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ के लिए पागल

Complete Sentence:

She is mad about fashion.

वह फैशन को लेकर पागल है।

Extra Example:

He is mad about music.

वह संगीत के लिए पागल है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

What do you ________ his strange behavior?
solution:
make of

‘Make of’ means to understand or interpret.

Hindi Meaning: राय बनाने के लिए

Complete Sentence:

What do you make of his strange behavior?

आप उसके अजीब व्यवहार को कैसे समझते हैं?

Extra Example:

What do you make of his behavior?

तुम उसके व्यवहार को कैसे समझते हो?

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She announced her ________ a businessman.
solution:
marriage to

'Marriage to' is grammatically correct.

Hindi Meaning: किसी से विवाहित होने की स्थिति

Complete Sentence:

She announced her marriage to a businessman.

उसने एक व्यापारी से अपनी शादी की घोषणा की।

Extra Example:

His marriage to a doctor surprised everyone.

एक डॉक्टर से उसकी शादी ने सभी को चौंका दिया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is happily ________ a businessman.
solution:
married to

‘Married to’ is used when referring to the person someone is married to.

Hindi Meaning: किसी के साथ कानूनी/वैवाहिक संबंध में होना

Complete Sentence:

She is happily married to a businessman.

वह एक व्यवसायी से सुखपूर्वक विवाहित है।

Extra Example:

She is married to a doctor.

वह एक डॉक्टर से विवाहित है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He got ________ his college sweetheart.
solution:
married to

‘Married to’ is the correct fixed preposition for relationships.

Hindi Meaning: यह बताता है कि किसी व्यक्ति ने किससे विवाह किया है

Complete Sentence:

He got married to his college sweetheart.

वह अपनी कॉलेज की प्रेमिका से विवाहित हो गया।

Extra Example:

He got married to his childhood friend.

उसने अपने बचपन के दोस्त से शादी की।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She wants to ________ him despite her family's objections.
solution:
marry — (no prep)

‘Marry’ is used without a preposition (not marry with/to).

Hindi Meaning: विवाह का कार्य संपन्न करना

Complete Sentence:

She wants to marry him despite her family's objections.

वह अपने परिवार की आपत्ति के बावजूद उससे शादी करना चाहती है।

Extra Example:

She married a lawyer.

उसने एक वकील से शादी की।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

This is a ________ time and money.
solution:
matter of

'Matter of' means a subject or concern.

Hindi Meaning: विषय या विषय

Complete Sentence:

This is a matter of time and money.

यह समय और पैसे का मामला है।

Extra Example:

It's a matter of concern.

यह चिंता का विषय है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Don’t ________ this to anyone else.
solution:
mention to

‘Mention to’ means to tell or refer to someone.

Hindi Meaning: किसी का ध्यान किसी बात की ओर आकर्षित करना

Complete Sentence:

Don’t mention to this to anyone else.

यह बात किसी और से मत कहना।

Extra Example:

He mentioned the issue to the manager.

उसने यह मुद्दा मैनेजर को बताया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

There is an urgent ________ volunteers.
solution:
need for

'Need for' is used when something is required.

Hindi Meaning: मांग

Complete Sentence:

There is an urgent need for volunteers.

स्वयंसेवकों की तुरंत आवश्यकता है।

Extra Example:

There is a need for improvement.

सुधार की आवश्यकता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

We must understand the ________ clean water.
solution:
need of

'Need of' implies importance.

Hindi Meaning: मांग

Complete Sentence:

We must understand the need of clean water.

हमें साफ पानी की ज़रूरत को समझना चाहिए।

Extra Example:

There is a need of immediate action.

तुरंत कार्रवाई की आवश्यकता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She felt ________ her speech on stage.
solution:
nervous about

‘Nervous about’ means anxious or uneasy.

Hindi Meaning: चिंतित या भयभीत

Complete Sentence:

She felt nervous about her speech.

उसे मंच पर भाषण देने को लेकर घबराहट महसूस हुई।

Extra Example:

He is nervous about his performance.

वह अपने प्रदर्शन को लेकर घबराया हुआ है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

We are all ________ our team’s performance.
solution:
nervous for

'Nervous for' is used when you're anxious for someone else's situation.

Hindi Meaning: किसी के बारे में चिंतित होना

Complete Sentence:

We are all nervous for our team.

हम सभी अपनी टीम के लिए घबराए हुए हैं।

Extra Example:

I am nervous for my brother.

मैं अपने भाई को लेकर चिंतित हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ public speaking.
solution:
nervous of

'Nervous of' is sometimes used but less common.

Hindi Meaning: डरना

Complete Sentence:

He is nervous of public speaking.

वह सार्वजनिक बोलने को लेकर घबराया हुआ है।

Extra Example:

She is nervous of heights.

वह ऊँचाइयों से डरती है।
